english.segment1: I have always wanted to be somebody who is great
english.segment2: To be great in, great in your eyes, is my dream. To be the one who makes you smile is everything
english.segment3: To love my enemies. To serve others until I become the least
english.segment4: To be great in, great in your eyes, is my dream. To be the one who makes you smile is everything
english.segment5: Greatness in this world is different than greatness in your eyes
english.segment6: To be great in, great in your eyes, is my dream. To be the one who makes you smile is everything
english.segment7: To be genuine in my love for others and for you is to be great
